content: Hi @WG-rls2.0 ! I've crated a "work list" paper doc: https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/RLS-2.0-work-list--AZ3BgHKKCtqszbsi3gi6sjchAQ-42vbnxzuKq2lKwW0mkn8Y. The idea is that you can add yourself to the doc if you want others to know what are you working on. 100% not mandatory :)
Are y'all doing weekly meetings of any kind?
Nice idea on the work list :slight_smile:
No, should we? I kinda prefer "meeting to discuss a specific point" more than "cron job to sync status" :)
I'd love to have name resolution sync-up some time soon

No, should we? I kinda prefer "meeting to discuss a specific point" more than "cron job to sync status" :)

not necessarily
I'm of mixed minds about it as well :)
I think trying different things is good
